enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.title: Pathway Enrichment
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.description: Pathways enriched for genes in this list - data from KEGG, Reactome and NCI
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.label: Pathways
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.views: primaryIdentifier, symbol, organism.name, pathways.identifier, pathways.name, pathways.dataSets.name

enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.title: Integrated Pathway Cluster Enrichment
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.description: Integrated Pathway Clusters(IPCs) enriched for genes in this list
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.label: IPCs

enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.title: Gene Ontology Enrichment
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.description: GO terms enriched for genes in this list. (IEA annotations are excluded)
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.label: GO Term
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.constraints: goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.namespace=[Ontology],organism.name=[list], goAnnotation.qualifier = null, goAnnotation.evidence.code.code != IEA, goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier != go:0008150, goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier != go:0003674, goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier != go:0005575

enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.title: GOSlim Enrichment
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.description: GOSlim terms enriched for genes in this list. (IEA annotations are excluded)
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.label: GOSlim Term
enrichmentwidgetdisplayer.constraints: goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.parents.namespace=[Ontology],organism.name=[list], goAnnotation.qualifier = null, goAnnotation.evidence.code.code != IEA, goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.parents.identifier != go:0008150, goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.parents.identifier != go:0003674, goAnnotation.goSlimTerms.parents.identifier != go:0005575
